data.message:
PLEASE SHARE
Someone is using Kenny Roger's Picture and Name. It is a Scam. 
This person messaged me and wanted me to send money to Kenny's Miricle Foundation. I did not send any money. This is the name and address he used.
Akin David address block 5 Savanah estate Abuja Nigeria Test Question, Color, Answer; Green. 
E - Mail,, Address 
KennyRogersOfficialyahoo.com
Please Share this with Everyone

replies.message: Hey, Janice. Fake profiles created to imitate real people (impostor accounts) aren't allowed on Facebook. If someone created an account pretending to be someone you know, please report it by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2m9kwio. -Rhea
